skill.name: pr-prepare
skill.description: Prepare pull request descriptions following project template. Activates on: prepare PR, create PR, pull request, ready for PR, draft PR, write PR
skill.summary: Prepare pull request descriptions following project template. Activates on: prepare PR, create PR, p...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill. Contains only workflow instructions and markdown templates for preparing PR descriptions. No executable code, network requests, file system access, or external command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Writing quality pull request descriptions takes time and is often skipped. This skill automates PR description creation by analyzing git changes and generating standardized descriptions following project conventions.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes git changes using log and diff commands
Generates structured PR descriptions with summary, changes, and impact sections
Suggests PR titles following conventional commits format
Outputs ready-to-copy markdown for GitHub PRs
limitations: Requires git repository with tracked changes
Does not push branches or create PRs directly
Assumes main as base branch (may need adjustment)
Does not validate that tests or linting actually pass

use_cases.title: Streamline personal PR workflow
use_cases.description: Quickly generate consistent, well-documented PR descriptions without manual copy-pasting

use_cases.title: Enforce PR documentation standards
use_cases.description: Ensure every pull request includes required sections for changes, impact, and testing status

use_cases.title: Improve contributor experience
use_cases.description: Help contributors write clear PR descriptions that make reviews faster and easier

prompt_templates.title: Basic PR prep
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare the PR for this branch

prompt_templates.title: With context
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare a detailed PR description for these changes. Include all modified files and testing notes

prompt_templates.title: Quick draft
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a PR for me to review before submitting

prompt_templates.title: Feature complete
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a production-ready PR description with all testing completed

output_examples.input: Prepare the PR for this branch
output: **Suggested Title**: feat: add user authentication with OAuth2
**PR Description**: A formatted markdown with Summary, Changes, Impact, Testing, and Notes sections ready to copy into GitHub
Plus: Ready-to-run git push and gh pr create commands

best_practices: Review the generated description before submitting to add context only you know
Run actual tests and linting rather than assuming they pass
Use the Notes section for follow-up items or known limitations
anti_patterns: Using the skill without reviewing the actual git diff first
Submitting without verifying test and lint commands actually pass
Skipping the Notes section for complex changes that need context

faq.question: Which git platforms work with this skill?
faq.answer: Works with GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket. The output is standard markdown compatible with any Git platform.

faq.question: What conventional commit types are supported?
faq.answer: Supports feat, fix, docs, refactor, test, perf, and chore. The skill recommends the appropriate type based on your changes.

faq.question: Can I customize the PR template?
faq.answer: The skill uses a built-in template. Modify the SKILL.md file to customize sections, formatting, or add project-specific fields.

faq.question: Is my code or repository data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill. Git commands run locally. All analysis stays on your machine.

faq.question: Why does the skill use the main branch as base?
faq.answer: The skill assumes main as the default base branch. For other branches, adjust the git commands or specify the base branch name.

faq.question: How is this different from GitHub PR templates?
faq.answer: GitHub templates require manual filling. This skill analyzes your actual changes and auto-generates the description content for you.
